markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 15"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Legendary Tattoo Artist](/Feats.aspx?ID=4083) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 118 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Tattoo Artist](/Feats.aspx?ID=2962)

</column>

---

Your craftsmanship at decorating flesh is unparalleled. You become legendary in Crafting. Whenever you craft a [magical tattoo](/equipment/tattoos) whose level is at least 3 lower than your level, increase all attack roll and DC values of the tattoo's activated abilities by 1, and increase all resistances granted by the tattoo by 1.
name: Legendary Tattoo Artist

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 15" pfs="Standard" > Legendary Tattoo Artist Source Treasure Vault pg. 118 1.1 Prerequisites Tattoo Artist --- Your craftsmanship at decorating flesh is unparalleled. You become legendary in Crafting. Whenever you craft a magical tattoo whose level is at least 3 lower than your level, increase all attack roll and DC values of the tattoo's activated abilities by 1, and increase all resistances granted by the tattoo by 1.
